articles.description: Bengals head coach Zac Taylor will be back for the 2021 season, but his staff is going to look a lot different. NFL Media reports that at least four assistant coaches will not return for another year with the team. Offensive line coach Jim Turner, wide receiv…
articles.content:
Bengals head coach Zac Taylor will be back for the 2021 season, but his staff is going to look a lot different.
